member.name: T:ADHDmail.Config.ConfigFile
member.summary:
Abstract base class for all config files.
Provides default implementation of file encryption and decryption as well as common config file locations.

member.name: F:ADHDmail.Config.ConfigFile._appDataPath
member.summary: Represents the path for the AppData folder.

member.name: M:ADHDmail.Config.ConfigFile.Encrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts a file so that only the account used to encrypt the file can decrypt it.
member.param: A path that describes a file to encrypt.

member.name: M:ADHDmail.Config.ConfigFile.Decrypt(System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a file that was encrypted by the current account using the Encrypt(String) method.
member.param: A path that describes a file to decrypt.
